summary: Adds a red retexture of the Heavy Dawnguard Armor to Gunmar's store's inventory.
descriptionHtml:
[b] [color=#ff0000][size=4]Red Dawnguard [b][color=#ff0000][size=4]Heavy [/size][/color][/b]Armor[/size][/color][/b]
If You're anything like me, you were a little disappointed that the heavy-armor version of the Dawnguard armor didn't come in red. After some looking around on the internet, I found many like-minded players but no mod to fix the problem...until now!

This is a basic mod that simply adds the ability to buy a red set of Dawnguard Heavy Armor from Gunmar's shop. It's upgradable and I'm fairly sure the anti-vampire enchantment is still intact. It's available for both male and female characters.
[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]
Requirements[/size][/b][/color]
[size=2]You will need the Dawnguard DLC to use this mod.

[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]Installation[/size][/color][/b][/size]
Unzip BSA and ESP files and add directly to your game's [i]Data[/i] folder.

[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]Programs Used[/size][/color][/b][size=2]
The[/size] Creation Kit
GIMP (With DDS Plugin)
Nifskope
BSA Upacker

Special Thanks to the Creation Kit Wiki for its tutorials, the Elderscrolls Wiki for helping me remember Gunmar's name, all of the fine men and women who made the tools I used, and of course the modding community at large for having forums I can lurk on.
author: Vitamin C Plus Plus
